output: html_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(batchplanet)
```

Read street tree inventory
```{r}
cityoi <- "AT"
df_tree <- read_tree_inventory(city = cityoi) 

v_taxa <- c("Quercus", "Morus", "Ulmus", "Fraxinus", "Betula", "Acer", "Populus")
```

Read and visualize the EVI curve.
```{r}
df_evi <- read_evi(dir = "alldata/PSdata/evi/", v_site = "AT", v_taxa = "Quercus")
df_evi
vis_ts(df_evi, v_site = "AT", v_taxa = "Quercus", v_id = 1:5, v_year = 2017:2022)
```

Read and visualize time of green-up and green-down at different thresholds.
```{r}
df_doy <- read_doy(dir = "alldata/PSdata/doy/", v_site = "AT", v_taxa = "Quercus")
df_doy
vis_doy(df_evi, df_doy, v_site = "AT", v_taxa = "Quercus", v_id = NULL, n_id = 5, v_year = 2017:2022, smooth = T)
```
